title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 116.3 - Designation of newspapers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 116.3 - Designation of newspapers

State Regulations

Within 15 days of receipt of the separate report authorized
by section
116.2
of this Part, the State

Comptroller will inform holders of abandoned property of the newspapers
published in a language other than English in which each item listed in such
separate report may be published. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
116.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
